notification.title: Kaupunkialusta
notification.mandatory: Mandatory information is marked with an asterisk *

button.noOpeningTimes: The place does not have opening times

index.title: Together we'll keep the information of Helsinki's best places up-to-date!
index.message: Kaupunkialusta collects and maintains information about Helsinki's places for the benefit of locals and tourists. In this service you can register information for new places or make changes to the information of existing places.

validationFailed.title: The form has errors
validationFailed.message: Please check the information, the incorrect entries are highlighted below

saveFailed.title: The form failed to be sent
saveFailed.message: Unfortunately a technical error prevented the form from being sent. Please try again later.

saveSucceeded.title: Sending succeeded!
saveSucceeded.message: Thank you for the notification! The information will be checked before publishing.

notifyNewPlace.title: Do you want to add a new place to the service?
notifyNewPlace.message: Register new places to the service. Login first and register the missing place today!

giveTip.title: Give a tip!
giveTip.message: In case you notice missing, incorrect or old information, do us a favour and notify us about it. You can make the notification with ease without registering.

checkPlace.title: What information can be found about a place?
checkPlace.message: Check if the place has already been registered with us and what information exists about it.

modifyOwnPlace.title: Modify your own place's information
modifyOwnPlace.message: You can at any time notify new or changed information about your own place. Login first and modify.

completeOpeningTimes.title: Complete the place's information with opening times
completeOpeningTimes.message: Let the visitors know when your place is open.

completePhotos.title: Complete the place's information with photos
completePhotos.message: Let the visitors know what your place looks like.

sentModal.title: Melkein valmista...
sentModal.message: Thank you, the place's information has now been sent for review. Please continue by telling when the place is open to the public.

message.fieldFormat: $fieldName must be entered in the right format
message.fieldFormatUrl: $fieldName must be entered in the right format (e.g. https://myhelsinki.fi)
message.fieldNotJpeg: The selected photo's format is incorrect, the image must be in JPEG format

comments.title: Comments
comments.notice: Check the information and send the form. If you want, you can also leave a message for the handler of the information.

comments.label: Message for the handler of the information

phone.label: Place's phone number
phone.helperText: The phone number's format is e.g. 0501234567 or +358501234567

shortDescription.label: Place's short description
shortDescription.helperText: Note that the text cannot be in 'we' form. Length max. 150 characters
shortDescription.tooltipText: A short description helps the place to be found more easily with a search engine.

longDescription.label: Place's long description
longDescription.helperText: Also add information here about opening times. Note that the text cannot be in 'we' form. Length 120 - 4000 characters
longDescription.tooltipText: You can if you want include the short description here and supplement the description according to your needs.

inputLanguage.title: First select the languages in which you will give the information (one language is mandatory)

website.label: Website
website.helperText: The link's format is e.g. https://myhelsinki.fi
website.tooltipText: You can add an address here to the place's webpage or social media account.

location.title: Place's location
location.addressNotFound: Based on the address, a location could not be found for the place on the map. Add the place to the map by clicking the map at the point where the place is located.
location.addressIncorrect: Address incorrect, the closest suggestion is

map.title: Map of place
map.notice: The place is shown on the map based on the address given above. If the search result is imprecise or incorrect, you can correct it by moving the marker on the map to the right place. We recommend that the marker is located at the main entrance to the place.

notifier.title: Notifier's information
notifier.tooltipText: The place's representative is the owner or someone else who indicates they represent the place's information. For example, a tourist or local resident do not represent the place.

phone.label: Notifier's phone number
phone.helperText: The phone number's format is e.g. 0501234567 or +358501234567

opening.title: Opening times
opening.notice: Opening times are notified after sending.
opening.temporaryNotice: Opening times may change often due to the due to exceptional circumstances caused by the coronavirus pandemic. We recommend for the time being to update opening times on your own webpage or social media channels. You can tell customers in the long description field where the current opening times can be checked from. Please don't put links in the long description, links to webpages and social media are added in the next phase.

photos.title: Photos
photos.notice: If you want, you can add 1-3 photos of the place here. In case a photo is added, its mandatory information is marked with an asterisk *

photo.title: Photo
photo.notice1: Select the most attractive and high-quality photos of the place. The photos should not have text, dates, watermarks or anything similar on them.
photo.notice2: The size of the photos should be at least 1920 x 1080 pixels, in JPEG format, and their size must not exceed 4 MB. The photos should preferably be in landscape.

url.labelDevice: Select a photo from your device

altText.label: Photo's short description (alt-text)
altText.helperText: Write a concise and as short as possible description of the photo. Length max. 125 characters.
altText.tooltipText: A description (alt-text) helps to inform the contents of the photo to a search engine or to people who for some reason cannot see the photo themselves. A reason for this could be a visual impairment, or that the photo was not downloaded, or the person does not want to download them.

permission.title: Usage rights
permission.notice: NOTE! You must have the rights to the photo you are uploading. By uploading the photo you grant Helsinki Marketing the right to distribute it forward in an open interface. You must choose one of the following usage rights for the photo. Check the terms of use for precise information.
permission.label: Photo's usage rights
permission.myHelsinki: The photo can only be used in connection with the place in question, for example the MyHelsinki.fi website. The photo can also be distributed as open data to third parties via the MyHelsinki open interface. The photo's usage or transfer for other purposes is forbidden. When using the photo, the photo's source and photographer must be mentioned.
permission.creativeCommons1: The photo can be distributed with the Creative Commons BY 4.0. license. When using the photo, the photo's source and photographer must be mentioned.

source.label: Photo's source
source.tooltipText: Photographer or other owner of the photo, for example an organisation.

placeSearch.title: All places
placeSearch.notice: With the name, search places whose information you want to view or change. You can check the information's correctness and notify about possible changes.
placeSearch.noticeLoggedOut: Log in to modify your own place's information.

placeName.label: Search places with the name
placeName.helperText: When the field is empty and you select Search, you will see all places

placeResults.notFoundTip: Tip: Check the spelling of the search term, or try to search with the first letters of the word or another search term.

newPlace.title: Do you want to add a new place to the service?
newPlace.notice: Register and notify the missing place

placeType.title: Place's type
placeType.myPlace: The place I'm registering is a

add.label: Add keyword
add.helperText: Search or select from the list. Select max. 5 words

terms.heading: Terms of use
terms.text1: The information notified and collected by the service is used in the MyHelsinki.fi web service. In addition, the information is offered by Helsinki Marketing's and Helsinki City's open interface to third parties. The database is maintained by Helsinki City, who has the right to select the material to be published and edit the text into a suitable form.
terms.text2: By sending this form, you accept the terms of use.
terms.link: Read the terms of use here

tip.title: Give a tip about incorrect information

placeName.label: Search places with the name
placeName.helperText: Write a keyword then select from the list below

comments.label: Change tip
comments.helperText: Describe your desired change as precisely as possible

details.label: Your own contact information
details.helperText: If you want tell your name, phone number and email address

validationFailed.title: Lomakkeella on virheitä
validationFailed.message: Tarkista tiedot, virheellisiä kohtia on korostettu alla

saveFailed.title: Tietojen tallennus epäonnistui
saveFailed.message: Valitettavasti tekninen virhe esti tietojen tallentamisen. Ole hyvä ja yritä uudelleen myöhemmin.
